name: Bhootnath Temple
history: Bhootnath Temple is one of the oldest and most famous temples in Mandi, Himachal Pradesh. It was built in 1527 by Raja Ajbar Sen, the founder of Mandi city.

name: Jai Tarna Temple (Shyama Kali)
history: Baglamukhi Temple in Kangra is dedicated to Goddess Baglamukhi and is believed to grant victory and protection.

name: Mata Hidimba Devi Temple
history: Ancient cave temple dedicated to Hidimba Devi in Manali.

name: Bada Dev - Kamrunag Temple
history: The Kamrunag Temple near Mandi is dedicated to King Yaksha (Barbarik), believed to be the grandson of Bhima.

name: Prashar Lake Temple
history: Legend says the lake was created when Rishi Prashar struck the ground with his staff.

name: Mata Shree Naina Devi Temple
history: Naina Devi Temple near Rewalsar is a sacred shrine dedicated to Goddess Naina Devi and is visited by devotees for blessings and protection.

name: Padmasambhava Cave
history: Padmasambhava Cave is a sacred Buddhist meditation site associated with Guru Padmasambhava.

name: Bala Kameshwar Ji Temple
history: Bala Kameshwar Temple is dedicated to Lord Shiva and is known for its peaceful spiritual atmosphere.

name: Mata Hanogi Devi Temple
history: Hanogi Mata Temple is a famous roadside temple between Mandi and Kullu where travelers stop for blessings.

name: Mata Bhimakali Devi Temple
history: Bhimakali Temple in Sarahan is a famous shrine dedicated to Goddess Bhimakali, one of the 51 Shakti Peethas.

name: Jai Bijlimahadev Temple
history: Bijli Mahadev Temple is dedicated to Lord Shiva and is famous for lightning striking the Shiva Lingam.
